attributes.action: act to remove the statue of Alison Lapper in Hero's Square
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since 2005, the fourth plinth in Hero's Square has been occupied by a hairless,armless,legless naked pregnant woman, whilst the others are held by distinguished military servicemen. Why does a woman who can and has done little for society deserve a permanent place in the square of heroes?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
